@moiraehansen Unless of course you are making changes that a supervisor has already suggested - that’s a different kind of editing! ☺️

@moiraehansen My top tip is give it a rest, do something completely different so you have a ‘cognitive break’ and approach it with fresh eyes! Second tip, if you can entice a ‘critical friend’ to proof also, you may pick up some interesting feedback too!
